subject: Hockey, Ice
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Saskin’s dismissal came two months after he was placed on a paid leave of absence following allegations that he and the senior director Ken Kim had read players’ e-mails.
snippet: Saskin’s dismissal came two months after he was placed on a paid leave of absence following allegations that he and the senior director Ken Kim had read players’ e-mails.
